data.title: Nisola LLC
data.meta_description: Nisola LLC (www.nisola.com) is an advocacy and business strategy consulting firm that is focused on serving clients interested or involved in the field of neurology.
data.text:
People

Eric Liebler is the founder of Nisola, LLC, an advocacy and business strategy consulting firm that is focused on serving clients in the field of neurology.

An emerging thought leader and advocate in the neurological community, Liebler's core strength of expertise is his deep understanding of the interplay between science, clinical medicine, product development and commercialization. With a background in marketing, commercial/clinical development, and finance Liebler works closely with his clients to accelerate and enhance their ability to interact with the relevant medical and patient constituencies.

Liebler has been an active supporter of the American Academy of Neurology (AAN) for almost twenty years. His intelligent personality and effective guidance has made him a major contributor to the recent successes of the association. He currently serves as Treasurer and public trustee of the AAN Foundation's board of trustees and was a founding member of the Foundation's Corporate Roundtable.

Liebler has previously held the positions of Executive Vice President for Corporate Development at Pharmacopeia, Senior Vice President of Strategic Planning and Communications for Questcor Pharmaceuticals, Vice President of Business Development for Enzon Pharmaceuticals, and President of Amarin Pharmaceuticals. Liebler began his pharmaceutical career with Athena Neurosciences, one of the pioneers of drug development in the field of neurology, and subsequently served as Head of Strategic Planning for Elan Corporation.

Most recently, Liebler was the recipient of the prestigious 2009 AAN Foundation Chair's Award.
